title: "Hype grows over “autonomous” AI agents that loop GPT-4 outputs"
excerpt: "Since the launch of OpenAI's GPT-4 API last month to beta testers, a loose group of developers have been experimenting with making agent-like (\"agentic\") implementations of the AI model that attempt to carry out multistep tasks with as little human intervention as possible."
